about_the_game:
Not a bossy type, but she has some sort of quiet strength about her. She loves the comforts of her mountain cabin, but easily handles herself in extreme conditions.

ABOUT ELEANOR

Age: 29
Height: 184
Blood: A
Bust size: J
Origin: Telluride, Colorado, USA
Interests: Woodworking, reading, knitting

Imagine your favorite blanket – soft, smooth and warm. Being with Eleanor is like being wrapped in it. You simply feel good. Her smile is reassuring. She is never rushing, and so time slows down when she is around.

WHAT YOU'RE GETTING

This DLC unlocks the legendary champion - Eleanor, with 120 trust, enough to immediately reach level 10.

You will also receive an epic equipment set, allowing you to use her in missions immediately, along with a legendary look for Eleanor (or its equivalent in nanites if you already have it).

And of course, by purchasing this DLC, you are supporting us. Thank you!

This DLC is non-refundable after activation.

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game contains content not appropriate for all ages, and is not appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content, some references to Substance/Alcohol Abuse.

All characters depicted are over the age of 18.

Mature content in this game includes:
- Blowjobs, Handjobs, and Sex
- Polyamory, Group Sex and Orgies
- Lesbian Sex
- Android Sex
- Consensual BDSM and bondage
- Punishment and instances of non-consensual sexual activities
